runs.comm: short on the off, pulled wide of mid-on for a single, West Indies are away
short and wide, cut away hard through point for a boundary, encouraging start for Simmons, Phil's nephew
sliding it on the pads, worked away through square leg for a single
a single to fine leg, was struck hard on the legs there as he tried to whip it square
swinging in, trying to drive it past midwicket, is struck on the pads, stifled appeal from the bowler but that was sliding down
appeal for lbw, looked close, bowled it full on middle and leg and Simmons tried to defend it from the crease, was struck on the pads and in line but he may have got an inside edge
a Gayle special that, short on the off and he whips in a manner only he can with his foot up to the square-leg boundary
great stuff, bowled at 154 kmph outside off, full and Gayle is tempted into playing the drive, misses
short outside leg stump, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, misses, gets a wide
gone! Bowled straight at 149 kmph, lands on a good length and Gayle looks to swing that over midwicket, misses and the stumps take a beating
...and goes! Short of a good length outside off, moves away a hint, pushes at it from the crease, gets a thick edge straight to Watson at first slip
sees it off, short of a good length, moves across and defends it back to the bowler
bowls it on a good length outside off, drives it wide of mid-on for a couple to get off the mark
short and wide, makes room to cut, slashes hard, misses

another one goes, Tait again in action, bowls it on a good length on middle and off and Simmons has a mindless, needless swipe at it, ends up miscuing it to third man where Tait takes a well-judged catch
struck hard but straight to the fielder, bowls it on a length on the off, driven straight to mid-on
short of a length on middle, gets into position early and pulls it away through square leg for a boundary
almost had him there, rose up to him much more than he expected, was late on the pull, got a top edge but landed safe in front of fine leg
short of a good length on middle, worked away wide of midwicket
short of a length outside off, moved away and he let it go
swinging in, bowls it on a length, tries to crash it past midwicket, hits the inside half of the bat, gets a single towards fine leg
short of a length on middle, defended with a full face back to the bowler
bowls it full on the off, tries to crack it past extra cover, gets an inside edge on the pads, sneaks a quick single
excellent shot, pulls it away hard, short on the off, seized the length early, rocked back and pulled it past square leg for a boundary
bowls it short outside leg stump, tries to work it fine, misses, a run conceded
gone, Tait gets Pollard, West Indies are crumbling, superb delivery, short of a good length and shot away, Pollard prodded at it, got a thin edge straight to the keeper
pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
short of a length outside off, tries to force it past point, misses and it slides through to the keeper
bowls it full on the off, played straight to point from the crease
short of a length on the off, tries to punch it past midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads
too high a bouncer, that. Working up some good pace, almost hitting 150, but it's given a wide
short of a good length on middle, worked away past midwicket for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, defended to mid-on
short on middle, right length for Morton who pulls it away through square leg, flashes of encouragement here but so far, they've proven unsustainable
short of a good length on the off, punched towards mid-off for a single
short of a good length, defended towards point
full length outside off, slower one, picks it up early, launching it over mid-off for a boundary
pushed back down the pitch for a single towards mid-on
short of a good length on the off, punched wide of mid-off for a single
flat on the off, closes the face and turns it towards deep midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, defended wide of point for a single
hurls it full on the off, digs it out back to the bowler
pushed down the ground to long-off
flighted outside off, cracked through to deep cover for one more
smashed back past the bowler but Steven Smith at long-off does well, moving to his left, sliding and dragging it back in
short of a good length, defended towards point from the crease
five down, short on the off, a touch too quick for Hinds who tries to pull, gets the top edge and Watson, at square leg, runs back to snap a well-judged catch
full and wide, tries to drive it hard past the bowler, misses
bowls it on a length outside off, slapped straight to mid-off
slower one bowled short outside off, doesn't pick that, is too early into the pull, misses
short of a length on the off, punched past extra cover for a single
flighted on middle, swept down towards fine leg for a single
tossed up outside off, tries to swing it over midwicket, misses as it turns away
short outside off, slapped towards long-off for a single
pushed wide of midwicket for another single
played towards mid-off for a quick single
short of a length on middle, mistimes a pull wide of midwicket

That's No.6, Steve Smith times his jump to perfection after running from deep square leg, short and it's pulled hard, runs a few yards to his left, leaps and snaps that comfortably to send West Indies down into further trouble
bowls it on a length outside off, drives it uppishly towards deep cover for a single
short of a good length on the off, punched towards point
full and wide, steered towards third man for a single
fullish on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
short of a length outside leg, tries to push it past midwicket, is struck on the pads
flighted on middle, played back to the bowler
turned away through midwicket for one more
played down the ground towards long-on

nicely done, short of a length outside off, turns away sharply, cuts it hard past point, Warner, at deep point, runs to his left and dives full length in an attempt to haul it back but fails, valiant effort nevertheless
short of a length, slapped past extra cover into the deep for a single, well fielded by Birth who is cheered on by his home crowd
slashed away hard wide of deep point, Birt is in action again, diving to his left and keeping them down to three
played in the direction of midwicket for a single
short of a length on the off, cuts it towards point
pushed wide of midwicket for a single
fires it hard on leg stump, bends low to sweep, misses, is rapped on the pads but that would have gone down
short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
Warner into the act, dives to his right to save that caressed drive from getting to the ropes, just two to the score
flighted on middle, swung hard towards deep square leg for a couple
bends low and slog-sweeps it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a boundary
short of a good length outside off, slapped towards deep cover for one more
attempted yorker, dug out into the leg side as he tries to play it past midwicket
aiming for the yorker again, drags it to midwicket
some fight here by Ramdin, short of a length outside off, cut away hard over point for a boundary
bowled it short outside off, guided down to third man for a single
full on middle, drilled down towards long-on for one more
short of a length outside off, makes room to slash that past point, misses
short of a good length outside off, tickles it past point for three runs
Clarke tosses it up, it lands full outside off, Ramdin makes room and creams that over extra cover for a boundary
short on middle, rocks back and pulls it hard through square leg for a boundary, struck hard and gets the reward
bowls it short outside off, slapped towards deep cover for a single
swung away hard but straight to deep midwicket for a single
short of a length on middle, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
fiercely hit, short, makes room and slashes it hard past point, leaving no chance to the fielder in the deep despite his valiant dive
bowls it on a length, cracked towards deep point for a single
short of a length on middle, makes room to pull that past midwicket, misses
bowls it full on middle, in the slot for Morton who gets under it and dispatches it between long-on and deep midwicket
bowls it full outside off, cracks it hard towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled on a length outside off, cracked down towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, slammed towards long-off for one more
short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
spirited effort by these two, short on middle, pulled away over short fine leg for a boundary
short of a length outside off, cracked towards deep cover for a single
bowls it on a length on the off, slapped towards long-off for a single
bowls it on a length on middle, driven wide of midwicket for a single
Ramdin's showing some spunk at the death, bowled it full on middle, made room and slogged it over midwicket for a one bounce four
slower one bowled full outside off, makes room to crack it over extra cover, gets a thick edge to third man for a single
short of a length on the off, swats it just wide of extra cover for a single
timed it too well there, was the slower one that was bowled full outside off, made room and lofted it straight towards long-off who takes it easily to deprive him of a half-century

Steve Smith takes another beauty! Even better than the first one, bowled it on a good length on the off, Morton swung it hard and connected well but Smith was there waiting, it appeared as though it would clear him but he timed his jump perfectly and intercepted the ball, clasping it over his head and maintaining his balance to ensure he didn't step over the ropes, superb stuff
low full toss on middle, driven wide of mid-on for a single, he did well to dive and keep them down to just one
short of a length outside leg stump, given a wide
yorker, dug out into the leg side, did well to get his bat down in time
short and wide, makes room to cut, misses
shot! Full outside off, makes room and square-drives it through point for a boundary
short of a length on middle, went for the pull, gets the top edge and gets it towards fine leg for a couple
gets an inside edge towards fine leg for a single
short of a length on the off, tries to slap that over the in-field, gets a top edge but it lands safely in front of mid-off
short on middle, goes for the pull, misses
short of a good length on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
shortish on leg stump, tickled into the leg side for a single
short of a good length on middle, worked away through square leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, slapped past the bowler for a single
